mdRecord.dcterms:title: O wert thou in the cauld blast: Volkslied / Felix Mendelssohn-Bartholdy
O s√§h' ich auf der Haide dort im Sturme dich
O wert thou in the cauld blast
Mendelssohn-Bartholdy, Felix, 1809-1847. Duets, voices, piano. op. 63. English & German; arr. Volkslied. English & German; arr.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mendelssohn-Bartholdy, Felix, 1809-1847
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Originally for 2 voices and piano; arranged for voice and piano.
Publishers were active under these names in these cities between 1875 and 1889. Cf. Handbook of early American sheet music / Dichter and Shapiro.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: 12 songs / arranged from F. Mendelssohn-Bartholdy's part songs, with English and German words ; 11
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Songs with piano, Arranged
